Buttons Everywhere

Written by tlodge on 14 July 2015

In the last few days we've been hitting the road, demoing an early release of roomcast. We tend to start by suggesting that there are many features of websites and property management systems and even day to day living that could be 'buttonised': i.e. accomplished by the press of a button. One of the things that makes roomcast so elegant is that it can distill most wants and needs into a simple button press. By doing this, we can keep the time between a resident needing something and being able to act upon it effectively to an absolute minimum.

So what kinds of things can roomcast buttonise? We've read through thousands of posts on many residental forums to figure out candidates. We now have 85 examples of buttons that could exist in a residential development. A button might simply serve up some up to date information, or it might perform an (arbitrarily complex) action. Here is the list as it stands:

Information Buttons
  • Local Area
    • House Prices
    • Planning applications
    • Events
    • Cheapest flights on weekend
    • Cheapest petrol
    • Cheapest product [e.g replacement halogen bulb]
    • Cinema Listings
    • Sports Clubs
  • Recommendations
    • Plumbers
    • Builders
    • Restaurants
    • Gyms
    • Cleaners
    • Electricians
    • Child minders
  • Environment
    • Pool temperature
    • Weather
    • Air Quality
    • Pollen Count
  • Security
    • Scammers
    • Crime reports
    • Latest Webcam
  • Contact Details
    • Meet the directors
    • Out of hours
  • Instructional Videos
    • Plumbing
    • Boiler
    • Appliances
  • Property
    • Dimensions
    • Directions
    • Manuals
    • TV Signal strength
  • Codes
    • Bin code
    • Parking gate code
    • Front gate code
  • Policies
    • Pet policy
    • Balcony Policy
    • BBQ Policy
    • Noise Policy
  • Transport
    • Next bus
    • Next tube
    • Roadworks
    • Taxi Fares
  • Prices
    • Pending Charges
    • Ballpark insurance
    • Council Tax
    • Service Charges
    • Water
    • Gas
    • Electricity
  • Concierge
    • Concierge load [how many messages currently dealing with]
Action buttons
  • Bookings
    • Bike cage slot
    • Room
    • Cinema
    • Spa
  • Internal Requests
    • Meter Reading
    • Large item disposal
    • Building waste removal
    • Fob replacement
    • Delivery Expected
  • 3rd Party Requests
    • Dry cleaning
    • Valet
    • Takeaway
    • Florist
  • Security
    • Escort me
    • Trespasser
    • Vandalism
    • Noise nuisance
    • Antisocial Behaviour
    • Property Access Issue
  • Permissions
    • Visitor Parking Permit
    • Consent to sublet
    • Consent to re-mortgage
  • Reporting
    • Issue
    • Leak
    • Tv signal strength
    • Water pressure
    • Snag (new property)
    • Rate a service
    • Missing Mail
    • Lost Property
    • Pests
    • Health & safety issue
    • Smell
    • Litter
    • Temperature
